name: Lava Cake
description: Lava cakes are a sweet and chocolatey delicacy that have a molten chocolate center, served as desserts in many restaurants, but who knew you could make them at home? Here's how to make four at once!

steps.instruction: Preheat the over to 400 degrees Fahrenheit, and add flour to all four 6-ounce ramekins.
Place chocolate and butter in the top of a double boiler over simmering water. Stir frequently and avoid scorching of the chocolate until it is melted. Stir for about 5 minutes.
Combine the eggs and sugar into a bowl, and mix for 5 minutes until the mixture is pale and thick.
Once mixed, add in the melted chocolate, flour, cocoa powder, and a pinch of salt and mix until combined. Pour the batter into the ramekins.
Bake until the sides are set for 10-13 minutes. Let them cool for 5 minutes, and then serve with ice cream!
